about.title: About me
about.descriptionOne: Full Stack Web Developer with +2 years of experience in creating modern, scalable and high-quality web applications.
about.descriptionTwo: Specialized mainly in the Frontend, where I design and develop attractive and responsive interfaces using Angular or React (TypeScript) and Tailwind CSS or CSS3 for the final style.
about.descriptionThree: Previously, I use Figma for rapid and high-quality visual prototyping, ensuring an optimal and pleasant user experience.
about.descriptionFour: For the backend I use Node.js, Java (Spring Boot) or PHP (Laravel/Symfony), integrating complete solutions with relational (MySQL or PostgreSQL) and non-relational (MongoDB) databases.
about.descriptionFive: I am a passionate of clean code, good practices (SOLID, clean architecture), scalable design and continuous learning, working in agile environments.
